There were no other sightings in New York on or around August 22nd 1987
Summary: I saw a UFO hovering about 500 ft above friends house.
divs: Sighting Details I was sitting on my friends front steps onenight.He all of sudden said what the heck is that?.When I looked straight up Isaw a circular disc with light in the middle and there was a ball of lightspinning inside of another light.About 1 minute later the objects lights shutoff and disappeared.
